column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=' ( ( WN ) ) Why did you decide to create wikiHow ?
#Text=JH :
#Text=I think that providing people with a practical education is one of the most empowering things you can offer a person .
#Text=Imagine having detailed step-by-step instructions on how to do any activity you could imagine .
#Text=How much more could you accomplish as an individual if you could learn any activity ?
#Text=I think that building a universal how-to manual would be a tremendous gift for the world .
#Text=Knowledge is power and wikiHow has the potential to make all of us a bit more powerful .
#Text=I 've been interested in building a comprehensive how-to manual long before I first envisioned wikiHow .

#Text=My first attempt at building this resource was a website I used to run called eHow . eHow was and continues to be the largest and how to website in the world . eHow contains copyrighted content run on proprietary software .
#Text=When I ran eHow , the content was professionally produced and edited .
#Text=This business model worked for producing content on topics that appeal to advertisers in languages like English that have large advertising markets .
#Text=However , paying people to write and edit articles ultimately means that you have to make one of two sacrifices .
#Text=You either 1 ) sacrifice on breadth and do n't produce the topics that wo n't interest advertisers , or 2 ) you sacrifice on quality and produce content that does n't cost much to write .
#Text=I was n't interested in making either of these sacrifices , as I think the world 's how to manual needs to be high quality AND comprehensive .
#Text=So ultimately I decided that eHow 's model would not build the resource I envisioned .
#Text=When I discovered Wikipedia , I recognized that the wiki model had the potential to build the how-to resource the world really needs .
#Text=So I decided to sell eHow and use the proceeds to build wikiHow .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) Why did you decide to use a Creative Commons license ?
#Text=JH : We use a Creative Commons license to give our community the right to fork ( http://www.wikihow.com/wikiHow:Right-to-Fork ) .
#Text=In my opinion , people should be hesitant to contribute to websites where you only have the " right to leave .

#Text= If wikiHow volunteers think our site is going in the wrong direction , they can take all the content and all the software and move the project elsewhere .
